meanings.definition: A plant of the nettle family, with small greenish flowers and leaves that are covered in stinging hairs.
meanings.sent1: The hempweed in the garden caused a rash when touched.
meanings.sent2: Farmers try to remove hempweed from their fields to protect other crops.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat rolled around in the hempweed and got stung all over.
meanings.sent4: The dense hempweed patch was a minefield of prickly surprises.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the hempweed's sneaky stingers hiding among the leaves.

meanings.definition: A plant that is often considered a weed and grows in fields and along roadsides.
meanings.sent1: The hempweed near the highway spread quickly and overtook the grass.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners work hard to keep hempweed from invading their flower beds.
meanings.sent3: The hempweed seemed to be playing a game of hide-and-seek with the lawnmower.
meanings.sent4: The hempweed's persistence in growing reminded me of a stubborn child.
meanings.sent5: The fields were a sea of green, with hempweed waving like tiny flags in the wind.
